title: Gran's chocolate biscuit cake
ingredients: ['110g (4 oz) plain chocolate', '110g (4 oz) butter', '1 tablespoon golden syrup', '2 tablespoons cream or evaporated milk', '110g (4 oz) crushed digestive biscuits', '60g (2 oz) raisins', '60g (2 oz) halves glace cherries', '60g (2 oz) roughly chopped almonds']
